resources.string: New? Register now at OpenStreetmap and Wheelmap.org
No Wheelmap Account? Log in with an OpenStreetmap Account on Wheelmap.org, click on your "Account" and create a new Wheelmap-Account.
New? Register now at OpenStreetmap and Wheelmap.org
Why do I need an OSM user account?

Wheelmap.org is based on Openstreetmap. All the data you see on the map is coming from the Openstreetmap database. Hence, to be able to add or change information you need an Openstreetmap user account.
You need an Openstreetmap user account to be able to log in on Wheelmap.org.
You don’t have an OSM user account yet?

Four steps to log in:
1. Click on “OSM Registration” and register your OSM user account
2. Open your email client and click on the activation link
3. Open the Wheelmap app
4Log in with your OSM user account (username & password)
